alert.note: Alert for South Slopes Of The Eastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 2:33PM AKST until December 27 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Storm total snow accumulation 8 inches. * WHERE...South Slopes Of The Eastern Brooks Range. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST Tuesday tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan difficult travel conditions. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. Deep snow will make travel difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow will taper off this evening.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: South Slopes Of The Eastern Brooks Range
